node.title: England 'not on the ropes', Travis Head says despite blistering century
node.alt: Travis Head holds his bat and his helmet up in the air
node.description: Travis Head's stunning 85-ball century on day two of the first Ashes Test at the Gabba looks to have taken the game away from England, but Australia's centurion says there is still work to be done.
node.content:
["Travis Head says Australia's job is far from done at the Gabba, despite his\u00a0final session heroics seemingly taking the game away from England's weary attack.", "Head smashed\u00a0a stunning 85-ball century in the final session, ending the day unbeaten on 112 from just 95 balls.", "His superb innings put Australia firmly back in the box seat, taking\u00a0the game away from England just as the visitors looked to have gained a foothold in the match.", "England took\u00a04-47\u00a0thanks to the efforts of Ollie Robinson and Chris Woakes after Head came to the middle just before tea at 3-193.", "Yet despite wickets falling around him, Head prospered where his batting contemporaries failed, crushing 12 fours and two sixes in a brilliant solo performance.", "It was the\u00a0first time an Aussie had\u00a0hit a ton in a single session since David Warner did so against Pakistan at the SCG in 2017.", "It was also the third fastest in an Ashes Test behind\u00a0Adam Gilchrist's 57-ball onslaught at the WACA in\u00a02006 and legendary England slugger Gilbert Jessop's 76-ball ton\u00a0at The Oval in 1902.", "\"It's still a\u00a0pinch myself sort of thing,\" Head said.", "\"I'm not always guaranteed runs.\u00a0I know that.\u00a0It was the same today. The first 20 runs were really, really tough.", "\"The game opened up a bit, I was able to take my opportunity, and I put myself in that position which was pleasing.", "\"I took some chances along the way, definitely at the back end against the new ball, but I felt like I gave myself a really great opportunity.", "\"Today it went my way but a lot of work was done by the top order. I thought they've done exceptionally well to set the day up to make it possible to do what I was able to do.\"", "
Battered England showed 'heart'
", "", "
Ollie Robinson impressed for England with 3-48, but left the field injured late in the day.(AP: Tertius Pickard)
", "England had some promising moments during the match, including claiming the early wicket of Marcus Harris for 3.\u00a0", "However, defending a first innings score of just 147 and desperately short of match practice, the bowlers were always up against it and toiled in the hot and humid conditions.", "The lack of match fitness clearly began to tell, with\u00a0Ben Stokes and Ollie Robinson both appearing to suffer injuries during the day.", "Bowling coach Jon Lewis said the interrupted preparation played a part, but that was not an excuse.", "\"I think overall there was some really good stuff,\" he said.", "\"Some really positive stuff came out of the day, we showed we can take wickets here.", "\"If you're being critical you could probably say we could be more consistent over the course of the day, and there were periods when the Australians got on top of us.", "\"Our preparation probably played a part in that last session, but it is what it is. It's similar for both sides.", "Along with the impressive Robinson, Mark Wood also stood up, regularly topping\u00a0150 kilometres per hour on the speed gun while bowling\u00a0his highest number of overs\u00a0in a single day of a Test match.", "
Australian plan to attack Leach pays off
", "", "
Jack Leach had a bad day with the ball, conceding 95 runs in just 11 overs.(Getty Images: Chris Hyde)
", "But England spinner Jack Leach\u00a0had a disastrous day, getting hit for a whopping 95 runs from his 11 overs.", "Lewis said \"resilient guy\"\u00a0Leach would\u00a0\"come back strongly tomorrow\" and defended the selection England went with, despite criticism growing for\u00a0not picking one of veteran quicks Stuart Broad or James Anderson.", "\"I don't think [we're a seamer light],\" he said.", "\"If we'd all bowled to the best of our ability, we would have put Australia under a bit more pressure than we did today.", "\"We are a bit behind in the game, but I know the guys will come out fighting in the next three days.\"", "", "
Travis Head's 85 balls of mayhem equated to the third-fastest Ashes century of all time.(Getty Images:\u00a0Chris Hyde)
", "Head said Australia had planned to attack Leach\u00a0to keep England's quick bowlers bowling for as long as possible in the Brisbane heat.", "\"We spoke about being positive against the spin,\" Head said.", "\"With it being hot, we want, obviously, the [pace] bowlers to come back as much as we possibly can.", "\"We were brave today I felt, some of the positions we were in and the way we were able to take [Leach]\u00a0on.", "\"It's not always going to be like that, we know. There's going to be moments when he's\u00a0going to bowl extremely well and be important for them.", "\"But I know the group is really proud about the way the guys set the tone at the start of the day.\"", "Despite Australia taking a mammoth 196-run lead into the third day, Head said England were not out of contention yet.", "\"I wouldn't say [England are] on the ropes,\" Head said.", "\"They'll come back tomorrow fresher and stronger and try and put us under pressure again.", "\"We've got to get it right again tomorrow. It's a long series and we need to continue that momentum that we have currently and not let it go.\""]
